definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
list of emperors and kings/dynastic genealogy

sentences.english: In feudal society, the dragon also be regarded as a symbol of the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 在封建社会，龙更被视作帝王的象征。

sentences.english: Qinshihuang Mausoleum is the largest one of Emperor Mausoleums in our country.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇陵是我国最大的帝王陵园。

sentences.english: The emperor's chop even gave authority to various levels of governments.
sentences.chinese: 帝王的御玺甚至可将权利赋予不同层级的政府。

sentences.english: Some of the first batch of imperial treasures being transfered, 1937.
sentences.chinese: 1937年，首批帝王宝藏中的一些被转运。

sentences.english: In ancient China, emperors followed the rite of offering sacrifices to the sun in spring and to the moon in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 在中国古代，帝王，祭祀仪式在春天的阳光和秋月。

sentences.english: And this is the way the emperor would forever then try to present himself.
sentences.chinese: 帝王永远都是这么表现自己的。

sentences.english: I disdained the situation with regard emperors swap .
sentences.chinese: 我不屑把处境跟帝王对调。

sentences.english: Later, dragon became the symbol of power and monarch.
sentences.chinese: 后来，龙成了权利和帝王的象征。

sentences.english: Gold wreaths are rare and were buried with ancient nobles or royalty.
sentences.chinese: 这些珍稀的金器是古代帝王或其皇族的随葬品。

sentences.english: Or kings be breakers of their own behests ?
sentences.chinese: 为什么帝王要违犯自己定出的法规？

sentences.english: No one could give King Moth a competent pair of wings, but themselves.
sentences.chinese: 没有谁能够施舍给帝王蛾一双奋飞的翅膀。

sentences.english: This is the "Vantage Wang Zhaohua Metroplex Plaza Chongqing."
sentences.chinese: 这就是“重庆华帝王朝华美达广场酒店”。

sentences.english: Following the imperial road leisurely, the drum-tower seems deserted yet the bell still sounds.
sentences.chinese: 沿着帝王故道慢慢走来，鼓楼苍然，钟声依旧。

sentences.english: The kings and royal governments often promoted the composing of Ci directly by ordering people to do it.
sentences.chinese: 帝王或朝廷往往以命人应制的方式直接推动词的创作。

sentences.english: Paracheirodon simulans and Nematobrycon paimeri "black" are the main ornamental fishes in this tank.
sentences.chinese: 绿莲灯和黑帝王灯是此缸中主要的观赏鱼。

sentences.english: Note the compendious final life of the emperors and their descendants who had great impact on the history.
sentences.chinese: 历史上有较大影响的帝王及其后裔附注其简明结局。

definition: the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
royal family/imperial household/member of the royal family

Five Legendary Emperors, usually taken to be the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] and four of his sons Zhuan Xu 顓頊|颛顼[Zhuan1 Xu1], Di Ku 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4], Tang Yao 唐堯|唐尧[Tang2 Yao2], Yu Shun 虞舜[Yu2 Shun4]
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
